MAN.TITLE: Matplot1
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: 2D plot of a matrix using colors

DESCRIPTION.P: The entries of matrix int(a) are used as colormap entries in the current colormap. rect specify a rectangle in the current scale and the matrix is drawn inside this rectangle. Each matrix entry will be rendered as a small rectangle filled with its associated color.
